name: Found (itch) (KumaruKing)
description:
Found is a visual novel with gay romance and furry characters, set in medieval fantasy world.

You play as a human who came to a city called North Hill, but lost all his memories. You don't know anything, nor anyone, including yourself. You wake up in a prison for a crime that you don't remember, and you don't know who you can trust.

Is this gonna be the start of a new life, or a journey back to where you started?

P.S. It's my first time making a vn/writing stories so please don't go too hard on me XP.
This is just a hobby project and I don't know if it will be finished one day.

Chinese Translation available!!!
